mapper.select: SELECT A.code as itemCode, A.name , ${@UserOrgEntity@CODE_TYPE_GROUP} as codeType, B.id, t1.name AS upperSuperiorName, B.upper_superior AS upperSuperior, B.oper_name AS operName, B.oper_time as operTime FROM icm_admin_group A LEFT JOIN icm_admin_user_org_rl B ON A.code=B.item_code AND B.code_type=2 AND B.atv_flag=1 and A.tenant_id = B.tenant_id left join icm_admin_user t1 on t1.username = B.upper_superior and t1.atv_flag=1 and t1.tenant_id = B.tenant_id

SELECT A.username AS itemCode, A.name, B.code_type as codeType, t1.name AS upperSuperiorName, B.upper_superior AS upperSuperior, B.oper_name AS operName, B.oper_time AS operTime FROM icm_admin_user A LEFT JOIN icm_admin_user_org_rl B ON A.username=B.item_code AND B.atv_flag=1 and A.tenant_id = B.tenant_id AND B.code_type=${@UserOrgEntity@CODE_TYPE_USER} left join icm_admin_user t1 on t1.username = B.upper_superior and t1.atv_flag=1 and t1.tenant_id = B.tenant_id
